page.title: 12COUNCIL HOUSING
page.content: The council houses on the Danesholme estate have very small gardens,and the front gardens have fences around them.The bricks that the houses are built from are all the same colour unlike the private houses. The streets with private houses on are usually a{mixture}of three and two story houses,sometimes with{flats}and {massionettes.}They are mostly terraced houses. The way the houses are set out is that they are grouped around a {courtyard,}with covered alleyways leading from one courtyard to the next. Some of the council houses have been bought by the people who live in them.
